titles.title: Always Look On The Bright Side Of Life

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c2 v3 c3 v4 c4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Cheer up, Brian. You know what they say. Some things in life are bad They can really make you mad Other things just make you swear and curse When you're chewing on life's gristle Don't grumble, give a whistle And this'll help things turn out for the best...

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And......always look on the bright side of life (whistle) Always look on the bright side of life... (whistle)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: If life seems jolly rotten There's something you've forgotten And that's to laugh and smile and dance and sing, When you're feeling in the dumps, Don't be silly chumps Just purse your lips and whistle--that's the thing.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: And...always look on the bright side of life... (whistle) Always look on the right side of life... (whistle)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For life is quite absurd And death's the final word You must always face the curtain with a bow Forget about your sin--give the audiences a grin Enjoy it--it's your last chance anyhow.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: So always look on the bright side of death Just before you draw your terminal breath

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Life's a piece of shit When you look at it Life's a laugh and death's a joke, it's true, You'll see it's all a show, Keep 'em laughing as you go Just remember that the last laugh is on you.

verse.name: c4
verse.lines: And always look on the bright side of life... Always look on the right side of life
